notes: Luxury high-end apartment with pristine white marble floors, modern open-plan kitchen with built-in appliances, elegant wainscoting, and premium leather sectional sofa. Excellent natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows with balcony access. For baby safety, the marble floors are very slippery, the glass coffee table has sharp corners, and the balcony visible in images would need child-proofing; otherwise very clean and well-maintained.
